content:
CompSci 269S, Spring 2009: Theory Seminar

The Theory Group meets Fridays at 1:00pm; this quarter we are in ICS, room 253. Below is this quarter's schedule.

April 10: No meeting
April 17: Rishab Nityananand An Overview of Zero Knowledge Identification Protocols
April 24: TBA
May 1: TBA
May 8: Nodari Sitchinava, External Memory Geometric Data Structures: Part II
May 15: Darren Strash, Filtering Search: A New Approach to Query-Answering
May 22: Lowell Trott, Sorting and Selection in Posets
May 29: Vladimir Braverman, UCLA, Measuring Independence of Datasets.
June 5: Kevin Wortman Linear Programming in Linear Time When the Dimension Is Fixed

Previous quarters' theory seminars
